title.rendered: Financial Commission Appoints Dr. Katerina Troshina to Blockchain Expert Committee

content.rendered:
January 14th,  2019, The Financial Commission today announces the appointment of Dr. Katerina Troshina to its recently formed Blockchain Expert Committee to boost self-regulatory efforts for digital currency exchanges and Blockchain firms.

Dr. Troshina joins a growing number of crypto industry professionals in the Blockchain Expert Committee (BEC) who are committed to working with Financial Commission’s Blockchain Association member firms to process client disputes, find common solutions to technological and legal questions and build a self-regulatory framework for digital asset firms.

About Dr. Troshina

Dr. Katerina Troshina is the co-founder of SmartDec. This IT-company united highly skilled software developers, mathematicians, and analytics. This team works together for more than 9 years with new technologies in code analyzing industry. For the few last years, team achieved skills in blockchain technologies including development, audit, and verification blockchain solutions.

Katerina has a master’s degree in economics. She is an application security specialist, highly skilled at working with the largest static analysis tools and binary analysis. As a researcher, Katerina has experience in different blockchain technologies such as state-of channels, Plasma, zero-knowledge proof methods. She is the lecturer at Lomonosov Moscow State University and Higher School of Economics. Her goal is to involve secure blockchain solutions to the financial industry as more as possible.

Blockchain Expert Committee

Financial Commission’s Blockchain Expert Committee (BEC) is comprised of digital asset industry experts, as well as legal and compliance professionals who are committed to advancing self-regulatory efforts for the digital currency trading community and finding solutions to common issues arising from the physical exchange of digital currencies by customers, storage of digital assets on the Blockchain.

The BEC is an integral part of the newly formed Blockchain Association which aims to unite cryptocurrency exchanges and financial firms transacting on blockchain that are committed to upholding the highest standards of commercial honor and best business practices. In joining the professional community companies and individuals have the unique opportunity to consult with industry experts, legal and compliance professionals and fellow association members about regional regulations and compliance in key global markets where digital currencies are in very high demand.

About Financial Commission

Founded in 2013, the Financial Commission is a leading independent member-driven external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for international online brokerages that participate in global foreign exchange (forex), derivatives, and CFD markets.

Financial Commission provides efficient compliance solutions to its members, alongside its External Dispute Resolution (EDR) mechanism that serves as an effective channel for processing complaints from clients of member firms.

To find out how the Commission is expanding efforts into self-regulation and transparency for the digital currencies and Blockchain markets, please visit the Blockchain Association page of our website.
